meanings.sent1: The dog was retrainable and quickly learned new tricks.
meanings.sent2: The retrainable employee adapted easily to the updated procedures.
meanings.sent3: The robot, though retrainable, still struggled with complex commands.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a retrainable sponge, absorbing knowledge effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The retrainable nature of the software made it a valuable tool for continuous improvement.

meanings.definition: Able to learn new skills or behaviors through training.
meanings.sent1: The retrainable student grasped the concept after just one lesson.
meanings.sent2: The retrainable athlete quickly adapted to the coach's new technique.
meanings.sent3: The retrainable cat surprised everyone by learning to fetch like a dog.
meanings.sent4: His retrainable memory was like a blank canvas ready to absorb new information.
meanings.sent5: The retrainable nature of the team made them a formidable force in the competition.
